definition: dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: Collect mulberry day asks to show autopsy to Limeng immediately.
sentences.chinese: 罗桑天立刻要求对李梦露尸体解剖。

sentences.english: These bluegrass pickers say they try to stay faithful to Monroe's style.
sentences.chinese: 这些采摘早熟禾说，他们试图保持忠于梦露的风格。

sentences.english: However, before she could re-start she was found dead after a drug overdose.
sentences.chinese: 在梦露重新开始之前，她因服药过量，被人发现死亡。

sentences.english: You see tons of Elvis or Marilyn Monroe impersonators all the time.
sentences.chinese: 你随时都能见到一堆模仿猫王和梦露的人。

sentences.english: Marilyn Monroe, he remembers, would come to the restaurant for a liquid lunch.
sentences.chinese: 他记得玛莉莲梦露喜欢中午来餐馆喝上一杯。

sentences.english: Marilyn was not completely in on the joke.
sentences.chinese: 梦露并不能完全理解这种玩笑。

sentences.english: In Marilyn’s America, there were aspirations.
sentences.chinese: 梦露时代的美国，有着高远的志向。

sentences.english: Monroe complains too about her early adolescent experiences of sexual harassment.
sentences.chinese: 梦露对自己少女时期经历的性骚扰耿耿于怀。

sentences.english: And then there is that wiggle, which she practiced by tying a belt around her knees.
sentences.chinese: 她把皮带系在膝盖上来练习梦露那个著名的扭摆姿势。

sentences.english: CAI core and cheese fine tracking Monroe, finally found a [in the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 蔡芯与芝晴跟踪梦露，终发现一洁身在医院。

sentences.english: However Marilyn Monroe's estate has called the film a fraud.
sentences.chinese: 然而，早期梦露遗产管理公司称这段短片是个骗局。

sentences.english: A week before Lincoln was shot, he was in Monroe, Maryland.
sentences.chinese: 林肯被杀前一周，他刚好在马丽兰州的梦露镇。

sentences.english: Monroe remorse was useless, said even the soup do not good, can not help but to tears flow.
sentences.chinese: 梦露自责没用，说连煲汤也做得不好，不禁流起泪来。

sentences.english: CAI core and a small man look but eye, deliberately play fans require Monroes signature.
sentences.chinese: 蔡芯和小曼看不过眼，故意扮歌迷要求梦露签名。

definition: Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
